info.description:
Postmark makes sending and receiving email
incredibly easy. The Account-level API allows users to
configure all Servers, Domains, and Sender Signatures associated
with an Account.
info.title: Postmark Account-level

parameters.description: The token associated with the Account on which this request will operate.
parameters.name: X-Postmark-Account-Token

parameters.description: Number of records to return per request. Max 500.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Number of records to skip
parameters.name: offset

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

post.description:
Creates a new DKIM key to replace your current key. Until the DNS entries are confirmed,
the new values will be in the `DKIMPendingHost` and `DKIMPendingTextValue` fields.
After the new DKIM value is verified in DNS, the pending values will migrate to
`DKIMTextValue` and `DKIMPendingTextValue` and Postmark will begin to sign emails
with the new DKIM key.

parameters.description: The token associated with the Account on which this request will operate.
parameters.name: X-Postmark-Account-Token

parameters.description: The ID for the Sender Signature for which a new DKIM Key should be generated.
parameters.name: domainid

422.description: An error was generated due to incorrect use of the API. See the Message associated with this response for more information.

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

parameters.description: The token associated with the Account on which this request will operate.
parameters.name: X-Postmark-Account-Token

parameters.description: The ID for the Domain for which DKIM DNS records should be verified.
parameters.name: domainid

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

post.description:
Requests a new DKIM key to be created. Until the DNS entries are confirmed,
the new values will be in the `DKIMPendingHost` and `DKIMPendingTextValue` fields.
After the new DKIM value is verified in DNS, the pending values will migrate to
`DKIMTextValue` and `DKIMPendingTextValue` and Postmark will begin to sign emails
with the new DKIM key.

parameters.description: The token associated with the Account on which this request will operate.
parameters.name: X-Postmark-Account-Token

parameters.description: The ID for the Sender Signature for which a new DKIM Key should be generated.
parameters.name: signatureid

422.description: An error was generated due to incorrect use of the API. See the Message associated with this response for more information.

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

parameters.description: The token associated with the Account on which this request will operate.
parameters.name: X-Postmark-Account-Token

parameters.description: The ID for the Sender Signature that should have its confirmation email resent.
parameters.name: signatureid

422.description: An error was generated due to incorrect use of the API. See the Message associated with this response for more information.

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.

parameters.description: The token associated with the Account on which this request will operate.
parameters.name: X-Postmark-Account-Token

parameters.description: The ID for the Sender Signature for which SPF DNS records should be verified.
parameters.name: signatureid

500.description: Indicates an internal server error occurred.
